metadata.title: CVE-2017-11721 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in ioquake3 before 2017-08-02 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted packet.

criterions.comment: ioquake3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
